WRITING.TITLE: Last xmas gift done just in time

WRITING.TITLE: When I eat dinner before feeding the cat

WRITING.TEXT: Medium yarn (4) knit in the round (70) then (22) rows main colour, then (22) rows secondary colour. There is 10 blocks of main colour and 9 blocks secondary. Added the tasles at the end to join the ends. I used a size 16 round needle for the wntiee thing and a crochet hook for the tasles
Only yarn I could find at my local craft shop that fit the bronze was lion brand yarn in rust colour
Thank you! Of course the colours are perfect :)
